[TITLE]
<line: 28> SUMMONS IN A CIVIL ACTION

[TEXT]
<line: 30> To: (Defendant’s name and address)
<line: 31> Edible Arrangements, LLC 
<line: 32> c/o 
<line: 33> C T Corporation System 
<line: 34> One Corporate Center, Hartford, CT 06103.

[TEXT]
<line: 36> A lawsuit has been filed against you.

[TEXT]
<line: 38> Within 21 days after service of this summons on you (not counting the day you received it) — or 60 days if you
<line: 39> are the United States or a United States agency, or an officer or employee of the United States described in Fed. R. Civ.
<line: 40> P. 12 (a)(2) or (3) — you must serve on the plaintiff an answer to the attached complaint or a motion under Rule 12 of
<line: 41> the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure.  The answer or motion must be served on the plaintiff or plaintiff’s attorney,
<line: 42> whose name and address are:

[TEXT]
<line: 44> Ryan E. Hatch 
<line: 45> 13323 Washington Blvd., Suite 100 
<line: 46> Los Angeles, CA 90066 
<line: 47> ryan@ryanehatch.com 
<line: 48> 310-279-5076

[TEXT]
<line: 50> If you fail to respond, judgment by default will be entered against you for the relief demanded in the complaint. 
<line: 51> You also must file your answer or motion with the court.

[ABANDON]

<line: 8> PROOF OF SERVICE

[TITLE]
<line: 10> (This section should not be filed with the court unless required by Fed. R. Civ. P. 4 (l))

[TEXT]
<line: 12> This summons for (name of individual and title, if any)
<line: 13> was received by me on (date)

[TEXT]
<line: 15>  I personally served the summons on the individual at (place)
<line: 16> on (date)
<line: 17> ; or

[TEXT]
<line: 19>  I left the summons at the individual's residence or usual place of abode with (name)
<line: 20> , a person of suitable age and discretion who resides there,
<line: 21>  on (date)
<line: 22> , and mailed a copy to the individual's last known address; or

[TEXT]
<line: 24>  I served the summons on (name of individual)
<line: 25> , who is
<line: 26> designated by law to accept service of process on behalf of (name of organization)
<line: 27> on (date)
<line: 28> ; or

[TEXT]
<line: 30>  I returned the summons unexecuted because
<line: 31> ; or
<line: 32>  Other (specify):

[TEXT]
<line: 34> My fees are $
<line: 35> for travel and $
<line: 36> for services, for a total of $
<line: 37> 0.00
